description:
This interface is great for block entry across multiple columns/rows and allows for mistakes to be fixed easily.

However, there are a few key issues with the app in its current version:
- The columned numbers don't reveal their hints past the fourth character, which turns the puzzles after Round 50 into a guessing game as to whether a column has more than 4 hints.
- The number hints are difficult to see once there are many squares on the board. A zoom-in and zoom-out feature would help to solve this, or for some way to click on a column/row such that its hints are displayed in larger text.
- Once a puzzle is completed, the victory text box completely obscures the puzzle itself, making it impossible to see the completed work. Either let us drag this window around, or present a "view current puzzle" button to hide the menu.
- The app crashed my entire computer after I scrolled quickly through the puzzles starting at Round 40.
The only missing feature I would want is arrow key support for playing on my laptop and a '?' marker for tiles that I'm not sure about yet.

It's an awesome game, but it needs better controls. A suggestion would be to toggle between colored and an X each time you click the square, rather than having to go down and change the marking at the bottom of the puzzle. Beyond that, this is great, and even works well with the stylus on my Lenovo Yoga.
The font for the numbers is much smaller than the row/column sizes making it very hard to read for larger puzzles. Also, some puzzles have multiple solutions. Otherwise, it's a fun game.
